entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

Humidity: 82 %

Wind: ENE 5 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow or rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
